'''Fragrant Wood "Huangcong"''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after solving an ancient ruins puzzle in [[Chizhang Wall]].

It is used together with [[Fragrant Wood "Chizhang"]] to unlock the entrance to the Ancient Jade Pendant in Chizhang Wall.
